text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump As opposed to Trump trying to destroy people's health insurance coverage so they rack up 100's of thousands in medical bills and as he commits treason, getting our soldiers killed and using the military and illegal militias to attack U.S. Citizens. Trump is deadlier than COVID19
